title: Walnut Hollow Creative Woodburner Introduction Value Pen for Beginner and Intermediate Woodburning, 4 Tips
description: Don't let the affordability of this basic wood burning tool fool you into thinking it's only for beginners. Its performance will prove valuable to even the most experienced wood burners and become a favorite tool in any collection. Use the 4 interchangeable points to execute all the fundamental wood burning techniques, plus curves, dots, fine details, and shading. Create personalized home decor and gifts with Walnut Hollow's full line of wood burning tools and wood surfaces, including bark edge rounds and planks.
